name: Soccer War (Commodore 64)
description:
SOCCER WAR

Whenever we think of a soccer game, we think of the typical match between two teams, but what if we turn the idea around? Then we have Soccer War. A game with the objective of surviving on the field to defeat your opponent, for this our weapon will be the ball with which we must eliminate everything that comes at us.

ARGUMENT

The great soccer championship has started !!

Futbolino, is the best player of all time, but to achieve the title that crowns him as such, he will have to demonstrate that he is capable of winning in the world's toughest competition, the "Soccer War". 

Three games separate him from glory, but they will not be easy. he will have to face all the rivals without more help than his ball and his skill, necessary to defeat his opponents in the great championship. You'll make it?

PHASES

Soccer War has 3 phases (3 soccer fields) and an extra bonus. Each with different conditions and adapted enemies.

ADITIONAL INFORMATION

The game is developed with seuck, a maker that facilitates the creation of games but at the same time limits the options. However, to overcome these limitations and create it with that classic and functional aspect, we have implemented improvements to it to achieve what we wanted.

Originally published: www.commodorespain.es

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

This game is prepared to play on a Commodore 64. using a Tapauino device. It can also be played on the C664 mini or maxi, or using compatible hardware such as emulation (Vice, CCS64, C64 forever, etc.).  Download the file and run the .tap file.
